summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Spokane Street, from First Avenue South to Klickitat Avenue; First Avenue South from Horton Street to West Spokane Street; Klickitat Avenue, from West Spokane Street to Sixteenth Avenue Southwest; Sixteeth Avenue Southwest from Klickitat Avenue to the north line of West Hanford Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5998, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
